### JuliaCon 2021 Virtual Conference

JuliaCon 2021 was held virtually from **July 28th to 30th, 2021**¹. The conference featured a wide range of activities, including keynote speeches, technical talks, workshops, and poster sessions. Some notable keynote speakers included William Kahan, Jan Vitek, and Xiaoye (Sherry) Li¹.

The event was accessible online, allowing participants from around the world to join and engage with the Julia community. All the recorded talks from the conference are available on YouTube, providing a valuable resource for those who couldn't attend live¹.

JuliaCon 2021 saw a record-breaking attendance with over **20,000 registrations** and more than **43,000 unique YouTube viewers** during the conference³. This made it the largest JuliaCon event to date, reflecting the growing interest and engagement in the Julia programming community.
